description:
CrOS - Escape punctuation characters in network names

Escape punctuation characters in network name strings so they appear properly using menu2.

BUG=chromium-os:14697
TEST=Create a wi-fi network with "&" in the name.  Verify that the "&" appears correctly in the network drop-down menu.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=83724

messages.text: Steven, I chose to escape the strings rather than change the menu API to make it easier to backport to R12, which we might want to do for this.

subject: CrOS - Escape punctuation characters in network names
